entry.title: How to test an API expecting Firebase token

link.title: How to test an API expecting Firebase token

entry.summary: Let’s say you are developing a backend API and you are protecting it with firebase tokens. This saves lots of development time on the frontend (mobile or web) just because Firebase Auth SDK does all the heavy lifting for token generation, refresh, etc, as well as on the backend for the exact same reason.
